# Class 12 

To find the proportion of people with Mexican Ancestry in LA that are homozygous for the G SNP, we need to import the data and analyze it. 
Data from: https://useast.ensembl.org/Homo_sapiens/Variation/Sample?db=core;r=17:39894595-39895595;v=rs8067378;vdb=variation;vf=959672880#373531_tablePanel 


```{r}
mxl = read.csv("MXL_SNP_Data.csv")
head(mxl)
```
```{r}
table(mxl$Genotype..forward.strand.)
```

```{r}
table(mxl$Genotype..forward.strand.)/nrow(mxl)
```

Now for GBR:

```{r}
gbr= read.csv("GBR_SNP_Data.csv")
head(gbr)
```

```{r}
table(gbr$Genotype..forward.strand.)/nrow(gbr)
```

This variant is more frequent in the GBR pop than MXL pop.
